subproject.corporate outcome: Enhanced national capacity to use ICT for development as driver for pro-poor capacity development and institutional building
subproject.description: a) Pre-university education process management enhanced through improved teaching and learning skills, b) Capacity of public institutions of Higher Education in their teaching/learning mission strengthened by increased deployment of ICT, c) the construction of a knowledge-based society accelerated  through utilization of e-Learning technologies in life long learning, d) foundation of the e-Learning industry in Egypt established through enhanced human capacities to utilize e-Learning competencies, tools, techniques, standards and available platforms.
subproject.title: Suporting EEI
